body_html: @SsnL Thanks for your feedback! I understand how you feel. When I was proofreading the translation, some places read a bit awkward and literal as well. The true reason is (more likely) that as a translator I still have a lot to learn and to improve. So if you (and whoever read the translation) let me know where you found awkward specifically, it will be very helpful. Thanks again!
